gets the job title of co-founder and will work on strategic projects and products.`` For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions,'' Eric Schmidt wrote. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt wrote. The change over indicates there's been a clear decision to put a technologist back in charge and to return some of the founding drive to strategic and day-to-day decisions, given Page's role

On Britain's Got Talent in 2009, Simon Cowell described their routine as one of the best things I have ever seen in my life . After their success in the TV talent show, Flawless have gone on to star in the movie StreetDance 3D, as well as appearing in music videos for Madonna, Beyonce, Leona Lewis and Westlife.

regrets of another domineering defense secretary-- the late Robert McNamara -- who came to describe the Vietnam War as`` terribly wrong.''`` That's not the case with Iraq,'' Donald Rumsfeld countered. I think the world's a better place with Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the Al-Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he added, insisting the President Bush administration's decision to invade Iraq in the wake of the September 11, 2001 attacks on the United States was`` incremental,'' not rushed.
